name: part_005
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ生誕祭2021】ゲストもいっぱい！楽しんじゃお！✨【3DLIVE】 [NuOJhtBC7R4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: MC section wrapping up the guest performance with Natsuiro Matsuri and Aki Rosenthal.
Transition to the next song performance.

subtitles.original: 次は誰だ？
subtitles.english: Who's next?

subtitles.original: アキロゼだ！
subtitles.english: It's Akirose!

subtitles.original: アキ先輩はいいよー！
subtitles.english: Aki-senpai is great!

subtitles.original: トワは？トワは？
subtitles.english: What about Towa? And Towa?

subtitles.original: その次がまつりで！
subtitles.english: And after that is Matsuri!

subtitles.original: （笑い声）
subtitles.english: (Laughing)

subtitles.original: ということで、今日はお隣に近づいた...
subtitles.english: So, today we got closer to our neighbors...

subtitles.original: そう！お隣、このトワ様なんじゃないかな？
subtitles.english: Right! Neighbors to this Towa-sama!

subtitles.original: お誕生日おめでとうー！
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: 『百花繚乱花吹雪』を、まつりちゃんと、アキ先輩と、
subtitles.english: We sang "Hyakka Ryouran Hanafubuki" with Matsuri-chan,

subtitles.original: アキ先輩と、トワで歌いました！
subtitles.english: Aki-senpai, and Towa!

subtitles.original: やったー！楽しかったー！
subtitles.english: Yay! That was fun!

subtitles.original: また来年もこうやって呼んでいただけたらお祝いしますので！
subtitles.english: If you invite us again next year, we'll celebrate with you!

subtitles.original: はい。来年はなんか大人の魅力がある人呼ぼうかな。
subtitles.english: Yes. Maybe next year I'll invite someone with adult charm.

subtitles.original: あ、ありがとう！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Ah, thank you! Thank you!

subtitles.original: え？アキ先輩はいいけどさ...
subtitles.english: Huh? Aki-senpai is fine, but...

subtitles.original: 大人の魅力？あれ？
subtitles.english: Adult charm? Wait...

subtitles.original: まつりの大人の魅力といったら...
subtitles.english: If we're talking about Matsuri's adult charm...

subtitles.original: お前どこ見てんだよ！おいおいおい！
subtitles.english: Where the heck are you looking?! Hey, hey!

subtitles.original: あ、ほら、あれじゃ。靴欲しいとか言ってたから、
subtitles.english: Oh, look. You were saying you wanted shoes,

subtitles.original: 買ってあげようか。先輩だからね！
subtitles.english: so maybe I'll buy them for you. Since I'm your senpai!

subtitles.original: マジで？来年呼んでくれてもいいよ！
subtitles.english: Really? You can invite me next year too!

subtitles.original: いや、靴なんて買ってくれなくても、一緒にやりましょうよ！
subtitles.english: No, even if you don't buy me shoes, let's do this together!

subtitles.original: 本当？よかったー！
subtitles.english: Really? Yay!

subtitles.original: お金で買収するところ見せちゃうところだった、危ない...
subtitles.english: I was about to show everyone how I bribe people, close call...

subtitles.original: めちゃめちゃ恥ずかしい！よく頑張った、よく頑張ったよ！
subtitles.english: That's so embarrassing! You did well, you did well!

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、いつもお世話になってるお二人とのコラボでした！
subtitles.english: Alright! So, that was the collaboration with these two who always take care of me!

subtitles.original: トワ様おめでとうー！
subtitles.english: Congratulations, Towa-sama!

subtitles.original: STARDUST SONG
subtitles.english: STARDUST SONG

subtitles.original: 画面越し 今日も見えている
subtitles.english: Looking through the screen again today

subtitles.original: いつもと変わりない笑顔
subtitles.english: A smile that never changes

subtitles.original: 纏う それは仮面か
subtitles.english: Is that a mask you're wearing?

subtitles.original: 本当の自分を教えて
subtitles.english: Tell me your true self

subtitles.original: 着飾る澄まし顔じゃなく
subtitles.english: Not that dressed-up, calm face

subtitles.original: 湧き出るほど 臆病なリアル
subtitles.english: A reality so timid it overflows

subtitles.original: 偽りは It's a sin
subtitles.english: Lies are a sin

subtitles.original: 真実を Open my heart
subtitles.english: Open my heart to the truth

subtitles.original: 君にすべてを 受け止めてほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to accept all of me

subtitles.original: 加速していく 世界で生きていく 僕ら
subtitles.english: We live in a world that keeps accelerating

subtitles.original: 聞き飽きたよ 擦れた誰かの声
subtitles.english: I'm tired of hearing someone's worn-out voice

subtitles.original: いちかばちかで 決められた運命ならば
subtitles.english: If it's a do-or-die destiny decided for us

subtitles.original: 抗うよ 見つけるよ 僕である理由
subtitles.english: I'll resist, I'll find it, the reason why I am me

subtitles.original: 可愛いだけじゃ もういられない
subtitles.english: I can't just be cute anymore

subtitles.original: 声を上げていくんだ Stardust song
subtitles.english: I'm going to raise my voice, Stardust song

subtitles.original: 憧れの自分へ 目一杯
subtitles.english: To the self I aspire to be, with all my might

subtitles.original: 足元見るだけで 精一杯
subtitles.english: Just looking at my feet is all I can do

subtitles.original: 夢中走っているよ 僕には
subtitles.english: I'm running in a daze, for me

subtitles.original: 君に触れることは できるのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I can reach you

subtitles.original: Breathe me, Answer
subtitles.english: Breathe me, Answer

subtitles.original: Countdown the Feeling myself
subtitles.english: Countdown the Feeling myself

subtitles.original: 君と呼応する 心のまま
subtitles.english: Following my heart as it resonates with you

subtitles.original: 飛び出せ！
subtitles.english: Fly out!

subtitles.original: 加速していく 世界で生きていく 僕ら
subtitles.english: We live in a world that keeps accelerating

subtitles.original: 未知の方へ 歩むことはやめない
subtitles.english: I won't stop walking towards the unknown

subtitles.original: いちかばちかの 賭けだったとしても 構わない
subtitles.english: Even if it's a do-or-die gamble, I don't care

subtitles.original: 立ち向かうよ 戦うよ 頂点を目指す
subtitles.english: I'll face it, I'll fight, aiming for the top

subtitles.original: そのために
subtitles.english: For that

subtitles.original: それは静寂の中に
subtitles.english: It is in the silence

subtitles.original: 声は力に変わる
subtitles.english: Voices turn into power

subtitles.original: Oh, polar star
subtitles.english: Oh, polar star

subtitles.original: もう迷うことはない
subtitles.english: There's no more hesitation

subtitles.original: 僕だけの 道しるべ 胸に刻んで
subtitles.english: I'll carve my own guide into my heart

subtitles.original: 加速していく 世界で生きていく 僕ら
subtitles.english: We live in a world that keeps accelerating

subtitles.original: 聞き飽きたよ 擦れた誰かの声
subtitles.english: I'm tired of hearing someone's worn-out voice

subtitles.original: いちかばちかで...
subtitles.english: Do or die...
